curator_overview: Fast, close, and show-friendly picks around Wellington International so you can top off feed, grab scripts, and make quick grocery runs between the warm-up ring and the jog strip. Everything here is venue-proximate with easy parking for rigs or SUVs and reliable hours during WEF.
curator_cta_text: Bookmark this list for week-to-week runs and share with grooms and barn managers.

grocery.name: Publix Super Market at Wellington Green
grocery.notes: Reliable deli/sushi, grab-and-go, and pharmacy window; easy in/out parking during peak hours.

grocery.name: Whole Foods Market (Wellington)
grocery.notes: Hot bar, prepared proteins/veg for late barn dinners; good for specialty items and rider meals.

grocery.name: The Fresh Market (Wellington)
grocery.notes: Prepared foods and produce; quick stop on the way back from vendor row.

pharmacy.name: CVS Pharmacy (Forest Hill Blvd)
pharmacy.notes: Scripts, first-aid, ice packs; reliable late hours during show weeks.

pharmacy.name: Walgreens (SR-7 Corridor)
pharmacy.notes: Quick photo/print, pharmacy drive-thru; useful for last-minute rider supplies.

pharmacy.name: Publix Pharmacy (at Wellington Green)
pharmacy.notes: One-stop with grocery run; good for OTC staples barn-side.

feed_tack_bedding.name: On-Site Vendors (Vendor Row & Stabling)
feed_tack_bedding.notes: Check Vendor Row for tack, supplies, and show-week services near stabling. Use the facility map for exact locations.

feed_tack_bedding.name: The Tackeria
feed_tack_bedding.notes: Iconic Wellington tack stop—boots, bits, repairs, and ringside fixes.

feed_tack_bedding.name: Tractor Supply (Royal Palm Beach)
feed_tack_bedding.notes: Backup for buckets, muck tubs, barn hardware; call ahead for shavings availability.

car_rental.name: Enterprise Rent-A-Car (Wellington/Royal Palm Corridor)
car_rental.notes: Good for week-to-week runabouts; ask for early pick-up to beat ring start times.

car_rental.name: PBI Rental Car Center (Palm Beach International)
car_rental.formatted_address: 1000 James L Turnage Blvd, West Palm Beach, FL 33415
car_rental.notes: All majors (National, Alamo, Hertz, Avis, Budget). Easiest for fly-in/out or spare team vehicle.

golf_cart_rental.name: On-Site Golf Cart Services (WEF Vendors)
golf_cart_rental.notes: Reserve early for season weeks; paddock loops and jog-strip runs go smoother with a reliable cart. See official vendor listing.

golf_cart_rental.name: Local Golf Cart Rental (Delivery to Venue)
golf_cart_rental.notes: Request barn-area drop-off and nightly charging guidance. Confirm paddock access rules and sticker requirements.
